00012 namespace mlpack {
00013 namespace kernel {
00014 
00024 class PolynomialKernel
00025 {
00026  public:
00030   PolynomialKernel() :
00031     offset(0.0),
00032     degree(1.0)
00033   { }
00034 
00035   /* Construct the Polynomial Kernel with custom
00036    * offset and degree
00037    *
00038    * @param offset offset to the polynomial
00039    * @param degree degree of the polynomial
00040    */
00041   PolynomialKernel(double offset, double degree) :
00042     offset(offset),
00043     degree(degree)
00044   { }
00045 
00055   template<typename VecType>
00056   double Evaluate(const VecType& a, const VecType& b)
00057   {
00058     return pow((arma::dot(a, b) + offset), degree);
00059   }
00060 
00062   const double& Offset() const { return offset; }
00064   const double& Degree() const { return degree; }
00065 
00066  private:
00067   double offset;
00068   double degree;
00069 };
